I did it!  You can now go to the events page and click on a link that will 
take you to a section of the page.  In example, click on the May 6th link, 
you'll go down to the May 6th posts.  Though it needs to be fixed up a 
little.  It's 3 AM so I'll be back in...two hours.  Keep most of your thanks 
for Zardus (Yanshosh), he provided the HTML.   I merely typed it out. <A 
HREF="http://nbwevents.tripod.com/nbwevents.html">Neo Beast Wars Events</A>  <
A HREF="Nbwrpg.tripod.com    ">Neo BW Reborn</A>
